subtitle.line1: Privacy and security are our core, we don’t run our business on data or advertising, but
subtitle.line2: on trust. We respect your rights and build amazing tools around them, not against them.

card1.title: Military-grade encryption.
card1.subtitle: We take your privacy very seriously, that’s why your files are encrypted so only you can access your files.

card2.title: Zero-knowledge technology.
card2.subtitle: We never store or transmit files, user passwords, or encryption keys in an unencrypted or unhashed form.

card3.title: Privacy by design.
card3.subtitle: We develop our products with the user in mind, and their privacy is a must in the data-driven world we live in.

card4.title: Secure from the core.
card4.subtitle: As security flaws and scandals are the daily news, we make sure our systems keep your data and files safe from attackers.

faq.question: What is Internxt Drive?
answer: Internxt Drive is a zero-knowledge file storage service that’s built for absolute privacy and strict security. Our service doesn’t access your personal data or files. Instead, it is designed to give you back control over your files and protect you from data collectors.

faq.question: How to create an Internxt account?
answer: Head to our website and click 'Get started' in the upper right-hand corner. Fill out the registration form by entering an email address, then create your password. No identity or email verification is required to start using Internxt's services.

faq.question: How to upload files to Internxt Drive
answer: Visit Drive Web and log in. Drag and drop your chosen files or photos directly into the browser window. You can also click 'New' in the right-hand corner of the browser, which will open Explorer or Finder, and select the files you wish to upload.

faq.question: How to install Internxt's app?
answer: Go to the Internxt website, scroll down the home page, and select 'Download apps.' Internxt App is also available Play Store or App Store. Once the downloading process is completed, you will be asked to run the app.

faq.question: Can I configure 2FA with Internxt?
answer: Yes. You can configure two-factor authentication (2FA) for your Internxt account from the Drive Web app. Moreover, you can use Authy or any other 2FA tool to generate your 2FA code with Internxt.
